uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.monitor

Interface IDataSynchroniser


  • public interface IDataSynchroniser
    An interface to describe classes which implement the logic to replicate data from HBase to PostgreSQL.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean synchroniseTables(EventMonitor monitor)
      Synchronises tables from HBase to PostgreSQL in accordance with the rules for a particular implementation (one implementation per table / dataset to replicate).

    • Method Detail

      • synchroniseTables

        boolean synchroniseTables(EventMonitor monitor)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Synchronises tables from HBase to PostgreSQL in accordance with the rules for a particular implementation (one implementation per table / dataset to replicate).
        Parameters:
        monitor - Instance of the EventMonitor which contains the state required to interact with the various databases.
        Returns:
        True on success, false on failure.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
